title: Google\Cloud\DataCatalog\V1\StorageProperties
name: StorageProperties
description:
Details the properties of the underlying storage.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datacatalog.v1.StorageProperties

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.file_pattern
params.description: Patterns to identify a set of files for this fileset. Examples of a valid file_pattern: gs://bucket_name/dir/*: matches all files in the bucket_name/dir directory gs://bucket_name/dir/**: matches all files in the bucket_name/dir and all subdirectories recursively `gs://bucket_name/file: matches files prefixed byfileinbucket_name*gs://bucket_name/??.txt: matches files with two characters followed by.txtinbucket_name*gs://bucket_name/[aeiou].txt: matches files that contain a single vowel character followed by.txtinbucket_name*gs://bucket_name/[a-m].txt: matches files that containa,b, ... ormfollowed by.txtinbucket_name*gs://bucket_name/a/*/b: matches all files inbucket_namethat match thea/*/bpattern, such asa/c/b,a/d/b*gs://another_bucket/a.txt: matchesgs://another_bucket/a.txt`

params.name: data.file_type
params.description: File type in MIME format, for example, text/plain.

methods.name: getFilePattern
methods.description:
Patterns to identify a set of files for this fileset.

Examples of a valid file_pattern:

  • gs://bucket_name/dir/*: matches all files in the bucket_name/dir directory
  • gs://bucket_name/dir/**: matches all files in the bucket_name/dir and all subdirectories recursively
  • gs://bucket_name/file*: matches files prefixed by file in bucket_name
  • gs://bucket_name/??.txt: matches files with two characters followed by .txt in bucket_name
  • gs://bucket_name/[aeiou].txt: matches files that contain a single vowel character followed by .txt in bucket_name
  • gs://bucket_name/[a-m].txt: matches files that contain a, b, ... or m followed by .txt in bucket_name
  • gs://bucket_name/a/*/b: matches all files in bucket_name that match the a/*/b pattern, such as a/c/b, a/d/b
  • gs://another_bucket/a.txt: matches gs://another_bucket/a.txt

Generated from protobuf field repeated string file_pattern = 1;

Examples of a valid file_pattern:

  • gs://bucket_name/dir/*: matches all files in the bucket_name/dir directory
  • gs://bucket_name/dir/**: matches all files in the bucket_name/dir and all subdirectories recursively
  • gs://bucket_name/file*: matches files prefixed by file in bucket_name
  • gs://bucket_name/??.txt: matches files with two characters followed by .txt in bucket_name
  • gs://bucket_name/[aeiou].txt: matches files that contain a single vowel character followed by .txt in bucket_name
  • gs://bucket_name/[a-m].txt: matches files that contain a, b, ... or m followed by .txt in bucket_name
  • gs://bucket_name/a/*/b: matches all files in bucket_name that match the a/*/b pattern, such as a/c/b, a/d/b
  • gs://another_bucket/a.txt: matches gs://another_bucket/a.txt

Generated from protobuf field repeated string file_pattern = 1;
